alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington; Simcoe Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 3:09PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Klickitat County through 345 PM PDT... At 308 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Bickleton, or 13 miles north of Arlington, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Klickitat County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington; Simcoe Highlands
